vulnerability.title: Set Boot Loader Password in grub2
vulnerability.description: The grub2 boot loader should have a superuser account and password protection enabled to protect boot-time settings. Since plaintext passwords are a security risk, generate a hash for the password by running the following command: # grub2-setpassword When prompted, enter the password that was selected.
vulnerability.recommendation: Review and remediate: Set Boot Loader Password in grub2
